author: CHARL D
review_title: Bank Zero Does Not Deliver Services!!!
review_content:
I recently opened an account with Bank Zero, and I was initially impressed with how quick and easy the process was. However, my experience quickly turned into a nightmare. Since Saturday, 22 February 2025, my Bank Zero card has not been working—I cannot withdraw cash, swipe, or even access my banking app.

To make matters worse, I have been unable to reach Bank Zero's customer support. None of their contact numbers seem to work, and when I search for help online, the number provided redirects to a software developer company—completely unrelated to banking!

This has caused me serious inconvenience and financial stress. I have an investment payout pending, and because I cannot rely on Bank Zero, I have had to open an account at another bank, which has cost me additional time and money.

I am extremely disappointed with Bank Zero's service (or lack thereof). If this is how they treat customers, I cannot recommend them. A bank with no working customer support and unreliable services is unacceptable. I regret opening an account with them.

#BankZero #BadService #UnreliableBanking #CustomerServiceFail

author: Thandokazi N
review_content: It has been two weeks since I have waited for my card delivery. Apparently bank zero does not deliver at home. I was told that I must go to a nearby government institution SASSA and later police station to collect my card. It is such a mission to receive a bank zero card. I will not recommend anyone to apply for bank zero card.

author: Alexia H
review_content: Customer service is a joke - sent request at 14:30 get a response at 21:15.  Not able to speak with anyone by phone.  Ridiculous whatsapp chat help.  40 minutes into "assistance" and no pogress...as if I'm speaking with a robot.  Need FICA guidance but seems impossible....you can't service customers with whatsapp.  No web banking, only via app.  Cutting costs to waste customers' time :-/

author: Remember N
review_content: Worst Bank they put a Hold on my account for 2 weeks now without any information regarding the hold I texted the their WhatsApp number the consultant is very Rude

author: Andy L
review_content: Great Bank and great service. I didn't have any issues opening the account and the account has been working great so far. I can recommend it. I'm happy with the bank. Keep it up.

author: Tiro B
review_content: Good day I have problem with my bank account I can’t do any payment or withdraw money I need help please

author: Sebolelo M
review_content:
I joined Bank Zero because I was tired of FNB. It's the cheapest of the banks for my banking needs and I already have a Capitec account but needed a second account. Bank Zero has exceeded my expectations! I find it better than African Bank and even Tyme bank. Their bank charges are cheaper, and because they don't use a call center, your issues are sorted on Whattsapp which is cheaper and quicker than calling. I get free, excellent and speedy service for both me and my business with Bank Zero. The only downside is that no one but the card holder can deposit cash into your account. Cash deposits are done at a POS and you need your bank card card to do it. If you want someone to deposit cash, they have to have your card. 

Other than that, the bank comes highly recommended!

author: Shane B
review_content: So far so good but….and this is irritating me even though touch wood nothing has happened yet. It’s silly season and every day some new **** seems to peep into my account. BZ hasn’t sent out any warning signs to their clients but somehow they know my account details. I don’t transact much and when I do it is local trusted companies. Dont fall into Capitecs trap and allow us to become victims, protect our information and our monies please

author: Thomas H
review_title: Worst bank in South Africa by a long shot (Do not use them until they fix basic banking)
review_content:
Until recently I tried everything in me to defend Bank Zero.
﻿
﻿1. My salary got delayed because Standard Bank used the wrong code for Bank Zero.
﻿
﻿2. I tried the cash send function, only for the person to collect the money at Shoprite to see that it could not be collected due to an error between Bank Zero and Shoprite.
﻿
﻿3. After years of testing, immediate payment launches fail miserably on me. FNB and Standardbank immediate payments had issues, so I had to transfer them to my discovery and then to the end user. This has happened three times to me now. They promised me at one stage that immediate payments would launch within 10 days maximum, but it also did not happen back then.
﻿
﻿4. The fact that public payments cannot be made was also a bummer.
﻿
﻿5. I had to jump through hoops for MTN to load Bank Zero on the debit order. The system did not pick them up as a bank.
﻿
﻿6. A lot of times Bank Zero is not existent as a Bank. Tried Old Mutual before for something and also could not find Bank Zero.
﻿
﻿7. Yesterday I tried buying a Voda pay voucher for Panarotti's. Guess what, did not work twice. Some Cryptogram error. Had to use my wife's Capitec account to buy it trying once. No issues.
﻿
﻿8. They lack innovation and are behind all banks at this point including new banks like Tyme Bank. No digital stuff like Google Wallet, rewards systems, etc.
﻿
﻿Reported all these issues but they don't even have the decency to come back to me with feedback on what went wrong and why. Also did not advise when it was fixed either.
﻿
﻿Don't get me wrong there are nice features like blocking unwanted debit orders, Tracking efts, etc. But with all the issues I had with them, I seriously don't know if I can trust them as my main bank.
﻿
﻿It feels like I will wake up one day and my money will be wiped due to a glitch or something. 
﻿
﻿I guess they are cheap for a reason. You pay for what you get. I tried being positive with all my replies on Mybroadband, But today I just had enough of this **** service. 
﻿
﻿When a bank cannot even do basic banking right it does not matter if they pay me to use their service. One day they will let me down big-time example when I need money to pay for hospital or other medical stuff.
﻿
﻿So disappointed.

author: Anthea
review_title: Customer Service as it should be
review_content:
I had a problem with an overseas payment, was trying to pay daughter school fees and was charged txn fees, but the payment was declined,  I contacted the institution overseas and it was a total nightmare.

Eventually contact bank zero to see if it could be reversed and was told that it could take come time and also be costly. Nonhlanhla said she would keep the ticket open until I reverted with a way forward. I went back to overseas institution and was awaiting feedback from them when Nonhlanhla messaged to say that she had spoken to someone else and that they resolved my query!

Nonhlanhla, THANK YOU!!!!!!!! you were working on the query even after we agreed that you would wait for my response!

This is customer service! The company should be happy to have you on board!

author: Lebogang B
review_content:
After submitting all my FICA documents and receiving confirmation that they have been verified, 7 days later, still no business banking account. I thought banking was supposed to get better with these new digital banks.

Instead of approval, I get this:
"Hi there, 

It seems like your business account application is not yet approved. We have reviewed your submitted documents and found them to be in order. Will advise once approved.
--
Kind regards,
Pretty | Customer Relationship Manager"

author: Andy L
review_content: Great wonderful Bank so far. Got my account opened with ease and I've got my card within time and without hassle. So far I'm able to communicate with the staff within time and no problems. I'm happy with the bank. The fees are great. Keep up the good work

author: Michael
review_content: Most difficult bank to get any assistance with. You can email or WhatsApp and get no response. Business account is useless as you are seen as a ******** if someone complains 3 days after placing an order. Wian Vermaak sent me an email once and just basically said they wont do anything to assist me. Account has been blocked for 3 weeks now. Business is at a stand still because of 1 ***** who thinks they own the South African economy and complained within 3 days of placing order. Unbelievable. Yet the banks are no longer there for the Businesses, rather for the complainant.

author: tamsin H
review_title: Bank Zero trustworthy, efficient, offers a business account
review_content: Early days so I will review again down the line, but so far, what an efficient and effective bank. I just opened a Pty Ltd and needed to open a business bank account. I tried for several days to get information from the 5 major banks in SA. It was so difficult to find the right person to speak to and get clarity on their banking fees. As an exasperated last resort I thought, why pay exorbitant banking fees to banks who don't offer good customer service. I'll try Bank Zero.. My experiese so far; They respond to email and whatsapp queries within a few hours if not quicker. The business account setup (which first requires that you open a normal bank account) was seemless. I uploaded the registration documents and within 24 hours I had a bank account. The card was printed and delivered to my nearest clicks for collection. So my experience so far is great but a few features would make this a better user experience: You cannot add multiple scheduled payments to the same beneficiary. I have multiple properties that I need to pay municipal rates for. So I need to manually enter the payment reference into the beneficiary payment on the app. It was time consuming as well as tricky typing in the small space. I do like internet banking on a computer where I can type quickly with 2 hands. Anyways, this may change. They do provide bank statements in CSV format if you want to import your statement into Sage Accounting which is what I need as I am running my business through SAGE. Finally, you cannot see a running breakdown of your transactions on the app. If you want to see anything you need to click on > Statements and Letters > Account Statements > Month and then you get an instant email with the account statement. Free I might add. But I would like to view my transactions in the app. For the rest, the efficiency of card delivery, the ease of opening the account online, I really am impressed. I do hope they attend to some features mentioned above but so far I'm staying with this bank. Makes you realise how much money is wasted on bank fees. Last year my other bank's fees were over R5000.00.

author: Samuel V
review_content:
I've been with Bank Zero since 2020 and use it as my primary bank. At first I was sceptic as I couldn't use my card on some POS systems and some institutions not having them on their systems to create debit orders. But over the years and excellent customer service, these issues have been resolved. 
I can buy electricity, put some money aside for my kid by using their savings account option and all my debit orders, which I get notified about before they trigger, works perfectly. 
I've lost my bank card a few times, but getting a new one in a few days is outstanding. The security is something I like the most, I don't use my real name on the card which makes it more difficult to use it online if you don't know my name. 
Who needs traditional bank benefits, some that I would never use but pay for. 
Thank you, Bank Zero for making me save more with you than any other bank.

author: Andrew S
review_content:
Just got my card delivered to my offices, very smooth process to activate the card and set it up.

I am amazed at all the security offered on the card and bank account, if only other banks will follow suit.

author: Thanda K
review_content: Bank zero is the most secure and cost efficient Bank I know. From online purchases to debit orders. They are the best. The only problem with them is that they do not offer the immediate payment function.

author: Martin M
review_content: Convenient bank for small savings. The App user interface needs bit improvements, it's not exciting with limited activity options. The App has no 'immediate payment' option. The transactional fees are minimal though

author: Reshoketswe N
review_title: Signing in on a new phone
review_content: The charges are low, but I lost the phone I've been using bought a new one, downloaded the app but it doest give me an option to log in, is only sign up. When I put my details it flags on my ID. So I have it but can't access the app since I can't log in which is very poor and bad.

author: Pieter K
review_title: Bank Zero - you can DO better!
review_content:
I was very excited to join Bank Zero, their value proposition resonated with me as a client and reflected in my disappointment with my previous 'brick and mortar' bank. 

However - I have been very disappointed with their customer service. Specifically their response time, their lack of detailed understanding, and their response to a very specific query.

My basic query was, I was not able to buy prepaid electricity from my Bank Zero app. I have sent the Bank Zero team multiple Whatsapp messages and screenshots with details about my query.

This problem has not been resolved for the last 2 weeks. I regularly get the following messages {after having to follow up}: 'Our team is investigating the issue, I will update you as soon as possible'........'I will talk to our tech team again, it should be fine by now though'..........'I have forwarded the new error message to the developers and will revert with more information'.

I have been a strong advocate for Bank Zero and their innovative, problem-solving approach to traditional banking as we come to know and accept it. However, I have lost trust in that strong belief - due to slipping up on the basics. 

Yatin Narsai and Michael Jordaan you can do better, you have my contact details on Whatsapp.

author: Wilhelm P
review_content: I tried to open an account.  They accepted me as a client then refused me as client, after they already encouraged me to deposit money, which I did and then struggled to get the money back.  Even though it is cheap - well maybe it reflects the value of their service.  I discourage anyone to use this bank.  On the other hand, I went to Capitec - what an absolute pleasure and contrast to Bank Zero!

author: wizebooks
review_title: STAY AWAY!!! - the Worst bank with as their name says ZERO customer service.
review_content:
STAY AWAY!!! - the Worst bank with as their name says ZERO customer service.  Its been 2 x weeks and they have taken my funds not allocating it because their FICA department cannot resolve a matter despite myself as a Chartered Accountant filling in everything 3 x times.

You are warned, worst experience in my life!

author: Rodrique
review_content: I initiated urgent 3rd party payments from 27 Nov.  7 days later Creditors are still waiting for clearance.  Upon enquiry with BZ I am told the matter will be investigated.  In the interim I have Creditors hounding me.

author: Ben P
review_title: Non-existent client-interface experience when opening a company account
review_content:
BZ offers probably the lowest running cost of a company account, which they recently brought to market.  Opening a company account is preceded by a personal account which is verified first and also used to transfer the first funds to the company account.  Sounds fine and dandy.
Not so fast.
You then have to upload several company-related documents via your phone. 
 All these documents reside on your computer.  How do you get these to your phone?  
No use emailing it to BZ - it has to come from your phone according to management!  
Focus on client service by BZ is less than zero to my mind.  No-one to talk to.  Only emails from BZ. 
When a new account is opened, bank management should be on top of their game.  Meet the new client's concerns and be a person he/she can turn to if in doubt.  Beat the other banks.  You have a competitive edge.
BZ has no offices such as conventional banks where a new client could call for assistance.  BZ executives should be particularly sensitive to the client's perception of the service he/she receives.  Happy clients are worth much more than all the adspend.

author: Preyan
review_title: Green ID book is apparently invalid form of ID
review_content: I opened up a BankZero account, uploaded my green ID book issued in 2000, and a manager named Ruskin emails me to say first, that my ID issued in 2000 is not valid and now says that my green ID book uploaded is NOT VALID. I wish you guys would not get foreigners to perform SA tasks because there is no other explanation for his comments. Thanks.

author: James
review_title: Likes to spam failed transactions and charge failure fees.
review_content: Loves to repeat failed payments at a cost of R2 per failure, often within a few minutes of each other (for the same transaction). It has a very narrow 'authorisation' window, resulting in more failed transactions. And the app has no clear support access for customers. I would not recommend them.

author: Rudi K
review_content: Digital bank with 'zero fees'. Yet customers are required to pay to receive a hard copy card and no digital card is available.

author: Phillemon
review_content: Bank Zero is a secured bank, they able to help you via WhatsApp if you have any questions.

author: Felix
review_content:
To purchase anything online is like going on a diet on the 1st of January. The app is very difficult to use and very user-unfriendly, ( and I know computers - so not illiterate there) Tap ain pin NEVER works. 

BANK ZERO - UPDATE your GUI to something friendly, or you will remain a zero in the market (never mind your patented fraud protection)

author: Elizabeth
review_content:
Bank Zero is the best bank in SA atm. You would think that they would be difficult to contact because they don't have any branches but this could not be further from the truth. Communicating with them is as easy as opening Messenger and their response is always very quickly, effective and friendly. I get the right answer the first time and never get put on hold or told to call a different number.
Everyone I know hates doing their banking but Bank Zero makes it fun because of all the new innovations, funky card and user-friendly app.
I feel I have the power in my hands, for the first time I bank on my terms, not the banks terms. I decide when, where and how I bank. I even decide how much bank fees I'm willing to pay, because they are so open and transparent with their fee structure.  For the first time in my life bank fees are no secret. 
Keep up the good work guys

author: Anthony
review_content: So far so good, please carry on innovating

author: Marco W
review_title: Scam bank unethical to its clients
review_content: Please do not use this bank. They do not have fair ethics what so ever. They made me reply within 1 hour or they will freeze my account. I replied within 1 min and ended up being told ***** you we blocking anyway. Taking my anger to facebook i have now been blocked. Showing you what kind of bank they wish to try and be.

author: Muller T
review_content: Can't close my account, keep getting daily email with my banking status. App has limited functions. Disappointing not recommended at all! Waste of time. They keep on telling me were working on the App. Maybe get your App fixed and functional before you launch an online bank!

author: Brian E
review_content:
I opened up an account with bank Zero, and despite them verifying all my data including my biometeric data, they have failed to unrestrict the app so that I can use the account. I have previously sent emails to them to request that the restriction be uplifted but up to now have not had a reply. On trying to withdraw funds from an ATM I was declined and fees charge to me although plenty of funds in the account.
It turns out that in order to  withdraw funds this functionality must be enabled on the app which I can not do as my account is restricted. 
Further to the above there is no way of contacting Bank Zero telephonicaly or an address advertised where the public can contact them  and one must rely on email facilities in the app which are not responded to.
As the founder of this bank is the former CEO of a major bank he and his colleges and staff should hang their heads in shame and either take the bank back to the drawing board or close down as the non ability to contact them telephonicaly or have an address to go to  is the same tactic that scammers use.

Dont be caught like I was go else were, you get what you pay for.

Brian Esakowitz

author: Alf
review_content:
Applied for an account earlier this week. Interaction with the bank purely online. Card delivered this morning and it was used successfully today to pay for lunch.
This is what a bank should be. No could-no-care staff with an attitude problem, that one needs to interact with.Just in and out with the internet and job is done.

author: Charl -
review_content:
I have twice now requested that Bank Zero close my account. They simply say that they don’t currently have that functionality, but that I can just delete the app in the meantime.

Not good enough. I want my account closed.

author: Lamar P
review_content: I have had this account since the testing phase, only tried using it actively the past 2 weeks, and it sucks. Could not buy anything online. Chuck it with all the unused makro and gym access cards.

author: Nazeer O
review_title: Does not support huawei mobile services
review_content: I am disappointed that bank zero does not support Huawei Mobile Services,  I am a bank zero cutomer and cant transact because in use Huawei. If smaller entities can support HMS why not bank zero.
